raw_body: SUNTHARALUXMY – SELVARAJAH (SUNTHARA) – (Rtd. Teacher Nugegoda TMV and Veena Artist Sri Lanka Broadcasting Corporation). Suntharaluxmy Selvarajah,​ adoring wife of late Mr Thampu Selvarajah,​ beloved mother of Sudarshini,​ (Dharshi),​ loving mother-in-law of Ravi Ramachandra,​ loving grandma of Vidhya and Arvind (all of U.S.A.),​ daughter of late Mr and Mrs Thirunavukarasu of Colombo and daughter-in-law of late Mr and Mrs Thampu of Nallur,​ passed away peacefully on the 8th of July. The remains will be kept at “Jayarathna Funeral Parlour”,​ No. 2B,​ Elvitigala Mawatha,​ Borella,​ Colombo 8. Last rites according Hindu Custom will be done at 10.30 a.m. on the 13th of July and the Cortege will leave for Cremation to the General Cemetery Kanatte,​ Borella at 12.30 p.m. * Viewing will be from 3 p.m. to 6 p.m. on 12th July 2023. Contact No. 011-2582150. 17,​ Murugan Place,​ Wellawatte,​ Colombo 6. Sudarshi (Dharshi) daughter.042376
